_header: Pray for me all that ye may
Subjects: prayers, asked on behalf of scribes

OxfBal329.Transcription:
Pray ffor me all that ye mayAnd I schall praye for yow both nyst
                    & dayeand ȝet for hym that thys dyd wryteon euery daye and
                    euery nyȝte
OxfBal329.Note:
Added to last leaf, verso, by a hand of the sixteenth
                    century.
OxfBal329.Editions:
Mynors,  Roger Aubrey Baskerville,
                        ed.  
             Catalogue of Manuscripts in Balliol College Library.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1962: 340.
